section.title: keystone_policy.json
section.para: The keystone_policy.json file defines additional access controls for the dashboard that apply to the Identity service.

note.para: The keystone_policy.json file must match the Identity service /etc/keystone/policy.json policy file.

section.title: nova_policy.json
section.para: The nova_policy.json file defines additional access controls for the dashboard that apply to the Compute service.

note.para: The nova_policy.json file must match the Compute /etc/nova/policy.json policy file.
